markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Vomit Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=726)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 227 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Apollyon](/Deities.aspx?ID=134), [Baalzebul](/Deities.aspx?ID=63), [Ghlaunder](/Deities.aspx?ID=36), [Kitumu](/Deities.aspx?ID=229)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You belch forth a swarm of magical vermin. You evoke and shape the creatures from your own imagination, allowing you to change the appearance of the creatures (typically a mix of centipedes, roaches, wasps, and worms), but this doesn't change the effect of the spell. The vermin swarm over anyone in the area, their bites and stings dealing 2d8 piercing damage (basic Reflex save). A creature that fails its saving throw also becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). Once the spell ends, the swarm disappears.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the damage by 1d8.
name: Vomit Swarm

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 227 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

---

<summary>
Vermin erupt in a cone from your mouth, biting and stinging creatures.
</summary>
summary: Vermin erupt in a cone from your mouth, biting and stinging creatures.

text: Vomit Swarm Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 227 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult, Primal Deities Apollyon, Baalzebul, Ghlaunder, Kitumu Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Area 30-foot cone Saving Throw basic Reflex --- You belch forth a swarm of magical vermin. You evoke and shape the creatures from your own imagination, allowing you to change the appearance of the creatures (typically a mix of centipedes, roaches, wasps, and worms), but this doesn't change the effect of the spell. The vermin swarm over anyone in the area, their bites and stings dealing 2d8 piercing damage (basic Reflex save). A creature that fails its saving throw also becomes sickened 1. Once the spell ends, the swarm disappears. --- Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 1d8.
